metadata.name: The F1rst Hero: Fight For Your Life
metadata.description: Jake Roth is the only man to ever manifest superpowers but not go insane.  While Jake is still trying to decide how best to use his new powers to help prevent a war between humans and "extrahumans", an old friend reappears and draws him into direct conflict with the local mafia who have their own extrahuman enforcer, Odinson!
